user.account_created_message: Your Terraso account has been created successfully with the following information. You can edit them any time.

group.membership_leave_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to leave the group “{{name}}”?
group.members_remove_confirmation_message: You are about to remove “{{userName}}” from the “{{name}}” group.
group.members_description_manager: Add or remove members in the “{{name}}” group.
group.default_content: Groups connect people with common interests and needs with and across landscapes.
group.form_new_description: Create a group to connect people with common interests and needs. Groups exist for people within and across landscapes.
group.list_description: A group can be an existing organization (like a landscape partnership or NGO) or any collection of people with a common interest.
group.list_new_description: Can’t find the organizations or groups you are affiliated with? Add it to Terraso.
group.form_description_placeholder: A short description of your group (600 characters maximum)
group.request_success: You requested to join the group “{{name}}”
group.request_cancel_success: You withdrew your request to join the group “{{name}}”
group.delete_not_allowed_manager_count: $t(terraso_api.delete_not_allowed_base). There should at least be one manager.
group.membership_request_cancel_confirm_messag: Would you like to withdraw your request to join {{name}}?
group.membership_close_description: Membership requires a group manager’s approval
group.membership_card_pending_description: <0>Your request has been sent to group manager. <1>Your membership is currently pending</1>.</0>
group.membership_card_closed_description: <0>{{name}} is a closed group, so the member list is not visible to non-members.</0><1>Request to join with a single click below. <1>Read more about group membership</1>.</1>
group.membership_card_info_title: [TODO] Join a Closed or Open Group
group.membership_card_info_closed_title: How to join a closed group
group.membership_card_info_close_description: <0>Step 1.  You request to join by clicking the ‘Request to Join’ button in Members box. You will see the pending state message during the process.</0><1>Step2. Group Manager(s) approve or reject the request.</1><2>Step3. You will see the result on your homepage.</2>
group.membership_card_info_open_title: How to join an open group
group.membership_card_info_open_description: Click/tap ‘Join This Group’ button in Members box. Notice the your membership has granted immediately.

tool.home_card_description: KoBoToolbox is a free open source data collection tool.

kobo.title: KoBoToolbox
kobo.description:
Design and build forms quickly
Collect data offline and online'
Analyze and manage data
kobo.requirements: Modern web browser (Chrome, Edge, Firefox, Safari)
kobo.availability: KoBoToolbox will be integrated into Terraso in 2022. Use Kobo independently for now.

account.disclaimer: If you don’t already have a Terraso account, signing in will create one in accordance with our Terms of Service.
account.unauthenticated_message: Your Terraso session has expired. Please log in again.
account.form_first_name_info: This name will be used to greet you in Terraso.
account.name_and_profile: Here’s the name and profile photo from your Google account. if you’d like to use a different name or an photo for Terraso, you can change them.

landscape.membership_leave_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to leave the landscape “{{name}}”?
landscape.members_remove_confirmation_message: You are about to remove “{{userName}}” from the “{{name}}” landscape.
landscape.members_description_manager: Add or remove members in the “{{name}}” landscape.
landscape.list_new_description: Can’t find the landscape you are affiliated with? Add it to Terraso.
landscape.default_content: Explore the landscapes in Terraso. Become a member of your landscape to connect with others on Terraso and lets you share information.
landscape.form_description_placeholder: A short description of your landscape (600 characters maximum)
landscape.list_empty: <0><0>First, double check the spelling of the landscape name.</0><1>If your landscape is missing in Terraso, you can <1>create a landscape</1>.</1></0>
landscape.form_email_info: This email address will be used by interested people to connect with you and your landscape.
landscape.boundaries_file_invalid_json: The file was not a valid JSON file.
landscape.boundaries_file_invalid_geojson: The file was JSON, but not a valid GeoJSON file.
landscape.view_map_boundaries_help_details: Contact your landscape’s manager or <1>send us a message</1>.
landscape.form_boundary_options_description: Tell us about where your landscape is. Uploading a map is the most accurate. If you don’t have one, you can <1>create a GeoJSON file</1>, drop a pin, or define your boundary later.
landscape.form_boundary_options_pin: Drop a pin on a map
landscape.form_boundary_pin_title: Place your landscape on a map
landscape.form_boundary_pin_description: Search for the city or region your landscape is in. Then, move the pin to the center of the landscape.

sharedData.title: Shared files
sharedData.description_with_files: Only the members of your {{entityType}} can download the files. <1>Read more about sharing files</1>.
sharedData.description_without_files: Upload your data files ({{extensions}}) and share them with the {{name}} members. Only members can download the files. <1>Read more about sharing files</1>.
sharedData.delete_confirm_message: Are you sure you wish to delete the file “{{name}}”?
sharedData.upload_rejected_file-invalid-type: {{rejectedFiles}} cannot be added because the file type(s) are not supported.
sharedData.upload_rejected_file-too-large: {{rejectedFiles}} cannot be added because one or more files are too large.
sharedData.upload_description: Add one or more data files (xls, xlsx, csv) and descriptions
sharedData.invalid_extension: The file extension ({{file.resourceType}}) does not match the file's contents

common.unexpected_error: Oops, something went wrong. Please try it again in a few minutes. {{error, errorParam(label: Error)}}
common.not_found_message: We couldn’t find the page you were looking for.
common.not_found_help_message: You can <1>let us know what went wrong</1>.
common.map_search_placeholder: Enter a city, town or region

share.title: Share {{name}}
share.invite_text: Check out {{name}} on Terraso and join me: {{url}}
